name: bunrise
description: lightweight and flexible front-end library based on Bun.js for modern web apps

scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run build:jsx-runtime && bun run build:jsx-dev-runtime && bun run build:bunrise && bun run build:browser-scripts
scripts.build:bunrise: bun build --minify --target=bun --outdir=out/bunrise src/bunrise/* && bun run build:cli && cp src/types/index.d.ts out/bunrise/index.d.ts
scripts.build:cli: NODE_ENV=production bun build --minify --target=bun --outdir=out/cli src/cli/build.ts src/cli/serve.tsx && NODE_ENV=development bun build --minify --target=bun --outdir=out/cli/dev src/cli/serve.tsx
scripts.build:jsx-runtime: bun build --minify --target=bun --outdir=jsx-runtime src/jsx-runtime/index.ts && cp src/types/index.d.ts jsx-runtime/index.d.ts
scripts.build:jsx-dev-runtime: bun build --minify --target=bun --outdir=jsx-dev-runtime src/jsx-runtime/index.ts && cp src/types/index.d.ts jsx-dev-runtime/index.d.ts
scripts.release:alpha: bun run build && npm publish --tag next && bun run clean
